title: A Stressed Sans
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417130340im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture1_4366.png)

Something I did by the morning coffee. I know it’s a bit early to post here but I’ll be developing this during the fall and you can comment when you feel like it. This might some day replace Peignot in a logo.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [stress01.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417130340/http:/typophile.com/files/stress01.pdf) | 318.96 KB |
author: Grot Esqué

comments.content: The 'A' is quite wide, compared to the rest.
The curves look a little dark to me. Overcompensating? The tail on K and R looks rather light. Also the U looks narrow. Do those critiques seem fair?
